__header__.command: Evaluate portable SSD options for D:\ObeliskOS
__header__.response: Recommended SanDisk Professional Pro-G40 4TB (~$600, <2 ms latency, ~2800 MB/s read/~2400 MB/s write).

__header__.command: Compare SSD vs. new PC for performance
__header__.response: SanDisk Pro-G40 sufficient; Zephyr testbed (i7-14700F, 32 GB RAM, T-FORCE SSD) meets LSU requirements (<3 ms, ~1000–2000 MB/s).

__header__.command: Plan Zephyr testbed donation for gaming
__header__.response: Suitable for War Thunder, For Honor (1080p/60–120 FPS). Migrate D:\ObeliskOS to T-FORCE SSD, add monitor (~$250).
Confirmed; RTX 4060 supports gaming needs. Plan custom PC (~$6500–$7000, Ryzen Threadripper 7970X, RTX 5090).
Focus on xAI API testing (connect_grok.ps1), codex debugging (glyph_codex_init.ps1), LSU caching (lsu_cache.ps1).
